data.message: Hello any one please help me . i have a Facebook profile in the name of Sahil Chemist. it was blocked by facebook because of this name. i want to get it back. kindly help me

replies.message: Hi Abdul. It is against Facebook's Statement of Rights and Responsibilities to maintain more than one personal account and this could be the reason your accounts were disabled. If you want to recover one account and remove the accounts you do not wish to keep, please do so by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2ub6N0k. -Ashley

Facebook 

Is it against policy to block an account and pretend it's not blocked, right from facebook? Because my only account has been blocked to expire my session instantly and demand a phone# but never permit me to enter one, all because I complained about prior blocking that was "temporary"

It feels like this is deliberate from facebook to ensure I have zero active accounts not "one". There is no possible feedback, no possible email, NOTHING. Fully locked out from anything.
Wow I know some that have more than 2 accounts!
